price: Those who believe and do not mix their faith with falsehood[25] are the ones who will be secure, and it is they who are rightly guided.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَمۡ يَلۡبِسُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنَهُم بِظُلۡمٍ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡأَمۡنُ وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ
footnotes: [25] i.e., they do not worship others besides Allah.
